long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly track your calorie intake with Calorie Counter | Food Tracker! This extension allows you to upload a photo of your meal and instantly receive detailed nutritional information, including calorie count, protein, carbs, and fat breakdown. Powered by advanced AI, it recognizes meals from images and provides accurate estimates, making calorie counting quick and hassle-free, no scales or boring measurements needed!

Key Features 🎩
✅ Upload or drag-and-drop meal photos for instant analysis.
✅ Get a detailed nutritional breakdown (calories, proteins, carbs, fats).
✅ Maintain a daily food log with a history of analyzed meals.
✅ User-friendly interface for effortless tracking.

Perfect for fitness enthusiasts, health-conscious individuals, or anyone who wants to simplify calorie tracking without relying on manual input or measurements. 
Save time and stay on track with your health goals! 🧘‍♀️🍎🏋️‍♂️
